text: mariyu maryam kumarudu isa (tana jati varito) ila annadi (jnapakam cesukondi): "O israyil santati varalara! Niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina allah yokka sandesaharunni, naku purvam, vacci unna taurat granthanni dhrvaparustunnanu. Mariyu na taruvata ahmad ane sandesaharudu rabotunnadu, ane subhavartanu istunnanu." Taruvata atanu (ahmad) vari vaddaku, spastamaina sucanalu tisukoni vaccinapudu varu ila annaru: "Idi kevalam spastamaina mantrajalame
